statements: SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-31';
SELECT event_name, description FROM academic_deadlines WHERE id = 5;
SELECT deadline_date, event_name FROM academic_deadlines WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, deadline_date FROM academic_deadlines WHERE event_name = 'Exam';
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT id, event_name FROM academic_deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, description FROM academic_deadlines WHERE event_name LIKE '%exam%' ORDER BY deadline_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT event_name, description FROM academic_deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY event_name ASC, deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines;
SELECT deadline_id, deadline_description FROM academic_deadlines WHERE notification_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM notification_subscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM notification_subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT deadline_date, notification_sent FROM academic_deadlines WHERE deadline_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT deadline_id, deadline_description FROM academic_deadlines WHERE notification_sent = TRUE ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, subscriber_email FROM notification_subscribers WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM academic_deadlines JOIN notification_subscribers ON academic_deadlines.deadline_id = notification_subscribers.subscriber_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deadlines FROM academic_deadlines;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message, deadline_date FROM notifications WHERE id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT message FROM notifications ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions JOIN users ON subscriptions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE deadline_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT users.username, notifications.message FROM users JOIN subscriptions ON users.user_id = subscriptions.user_id JOIN notifications ON subscriptions.notification_id = notifications.id;
SELECT notifications.message FROM notifications WHERE id = 3 AND deadline_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, notification_time FROM ImportantDates WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, event_name, event_date, is_urgent FROM ImportantDates WHERE is_urgent = true ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY sent_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImportantDates ORDER BY event_date DESC, notification_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, notification_time FROM ImportantDates WHERE is_urgent = TRUE;

SELECT Users.username, Subscriptions.subscription_id, ImportantDates.event_name FROM Users JOIN Subscriptions ON Users.id = Subscriptions.user_id JOIN ImportantDates ON Subscriptions.event_id = ImportantDates.id;
SELECT Notifications.message, Notifications.sent_time, Users.username FROM Users JOIN Notifications ON Users.id = Notifications.user_id WHERE Users.email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT Users.username, Notifications.message FROM Users LEFT JOIN Notifications ON Users.id = Notifications.user_id WHERE Notifications.message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Users.username ASC, Notifications.sent_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM important_deadlines;
SELECT topic, deadline_date FROM important_deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT sd.student_id, c.course_name FROM student_courses sd JOIN courses c ON sd.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM important_deadlines;
SELECT topic, deadline_date FROM important_deadlines WHERE deadline_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT c.course_name, s.student_name FROM courses c JOIN student_courses sc ON c.course_id = sc.course_id JOIN students s ON sc.student_id = s.student_id;
